rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Large, welcoming space with floor-to-ceiling windows on the facade for natural light. Decorative Art Deco detailing in finishes.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with a blend of modern and retro Art Deco elements. Incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample daylight.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the Living Room, featuring streamlined Art Deco furniture and design elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modern appliances and a slight open layout, following Vastu principles for auspicious placement of the stove.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private sanctuary with built-in Art Deco-inspired furniture and floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring privacy while allowing natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom designed with Vastu principles to enhance relaxation and positivity.

rooms.name: Bathroom (attached to Master)
rooms.description: Functional bathroom space in master suite, following local building norms for plumbing and accessibility.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Expansive entertainment space with wall-to-wall seating, ambient lighting, and acoustic optimization.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Elevated master bedroom offering privacy and scenic views, decorated in Art Deco style with floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed guest bathroom designed per local building norms and Vastu for relaxation.
